document_data.name: Rashad al-Klemari
document_data.mainbody:
'''Rashad al-Klemari''' was an [[elf|elven]] merchant who lived in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|59}}

He was not a member of the [[House of Al-Klemari]] merchant family.
document_data.Activities:
Rashad owned a small shop that faced the plaza housing the mosques of all the [[Zakharan pantheon|great gods]] of [[Zakhara]]. He sold religious items to the many pilgrims who visited the area.

Rashad was a religious man who worshiped all of the Zakharan gods. He attended services at the [[Golden Mosque]] twice a day.
